```{=html}
<script src="https://unpkg.com/micromodal/dist/micromodal.min.js"></script>

<div class="modal micromodal-slide" id="plant-modal" aria-hidden="true">
  <div class="modal__overlay" tabindex="-1" data-micromodal-close>
    <div class="modal__container" role="dialog" aria-modal="true" aria-labelledby="plant-modal-title">
      <header>
        <h2 id="plant-modal-title">Teste</h2>
        <button aria-label="Close modal" data-micromodal-close class="btn btn-ouline-secondary"><i class="fa-solid fa-xmark"></i></button>
      </header>
      <main>
        <img id="plant-modal-img" src="" alt="Loading..." style="max-width:100%; border-radius:8px;" />
      </main>

      <img id="plant-legend" src="/images/plant/legend.png" alt="" style="max-width:100%; border-radius:8px;" />

      <p style="margin-top: 32px;">For the full building plan, check the <a href="/info/venue.html">venue</a> page.</p>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

<script>
document.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", function() {
  // Initialize Micromodal with explicit modal id
  MicroModal.init({
    openTrigger: 'data-micromodal-trigger',
    closeTrigger: 'data-micromodal-close',
    disableScroll: true,
    awaitOpenAnimation: false,
    awaitCloseAnimation: false,
    onClose: () => {
      document.getElementById("plant-modal-img").setAttribute("src", "");
    }
  });

  // Attach dynamic trigger handler
  document.querySelectorAll(".plant-trigger").forEach(function(trigger) {
    trigger.addEventListener("click", function(e) {
      e.preventDefault();
      document.getElementById("plant-modal-img").setAttribute("src", "#");

      // Read data attributes
      const title = trigger.getAttribute("data-plant-title");
      const url   = trigger.getAttribute("data-plant-url");

      // Update modal content
      document.getElementById("plant-modal-title").textContent = title;
      document.getElementById("plant-modal-img").setAttribute("src", url);

      // Open the modal safely
      MicroModal.show("plant-modal");
    });
  });
});
</script>

```
